trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Blue Grass
There were no other sightings in Blue Grass on or around May 24th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was driving northbound on rt. 61, about 10 miles south of blue grass, ia. in the northeast sky, i saw a bright whitish light, rather large in size. there was almost a greenish tinge to a ring around the object. as soon as i saw it, i asked my husband if he saw it and he did. we only saw it for a few seconds and it made a downward arc and disappeared. i had no idea what it was. i'm hoping someone else saw it and has an explanation. i only saw it because it was so bright. it could not have been a plane, it was too bright, too big and moved too quickly in a downward arc to be a plane. there were also no light towers in the area, outside a red light in the north west sky that did not go off \ flash\ blink at all.
Summary: Driving. Saw bright white light with green edge floating, then made a sharp arc downward, disappeared.
